item.title: CS2003 - Usability Engineering
item.description: CS2003 - Usability Engineering Lecturer: Monica Pereira Lectures Week 5 - User Models and Conceptual Design Week 6 - User-Centred Design Week 8 - Specifying User Requirements Week 9 - UE Methods and Techniques - Prototyping, Mockups and Wireframes 100% Exam.

item.title: UE Methods and Techniques - Prototyping, Mockups and Wireframes
item.description: The Sketch in Interaction Design Two requirements approaches when prototyping an interactive system: Using a formal specification. Developing the specification out of the prototype.
